file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 30-12-10-04 - HORIZONTAL-STABILIZER ANTI-ICING SYSTEM MONITORING TUBES - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL HORIZONTAL-STABILIZER ANTI-ICING SYSTEM MONITORING TUBES - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove and install the horizontal-stabilizer anti-icing monitoring tubes. B. The anti-icing monitoring tubes are installed in the LH and RH leading edges of the horizontal- stabilizer. C. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY HORIZONTAL-STABILIZER ANTI-ICING ALL 30-12-10-000-801-A MONITORING TUBES - REMOVAL HORIZONTAL-STABILIZER ANTI-ICING ALL 30-12-10-400-801-A MONITORING TUBES - INSTALLATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 30-12-10 Page 1 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 30-12-10-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. HORIZONTAL-STABILIZER ANTI-ICING MONITORING TUBES - REMOVAL A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to remove the horizontal-stabilizer anti-icing monitoring tubes. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 30-12-09-000-801-A/400 DAMPING CHAMBER - REMOVAL HORIZONTAL-STABILIZER LEADING EDGE - RE- AMM TASK 55-15-00-000-801-A/400 MOVAL S.B.145-30-0022 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 331 LH side of the horizontal stabilizer 332 RH side of the horizontal stabilizer D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially To get access to the leading edges of the Ladder 1 available horizontal stabilizer F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE LH or RH leading edges of the horizontal 1 Does the task stabilizer I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A WARNING: DO NOT TOUCH THE DUCTS OR COMPONENTS OF THE ANTI-ICING SYSTEM IMMEDIATELY AFTER THE SYSTEM IS TURNED OFF BECAUSE THE HIGH AIR TEMPERATURE CAN CAUSE INJURY TO YOU. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 30-12-10 Page 2 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (1) On the overhead Circuit Breaker Panel, open the circuit breakers below and attach a DO-NOT-CLOSE tag to them. • (PRE-MOD. S.B.145-30-0022) STAB: (Location Tip: DC BUS 2/ICE AND RAIN PROTECTION/STAB). • (POST-MOD. S.B.145-30-0022) STAB A/I IND: (Location Tip: DC BUS 1/ICE AND RAIN PROTECTION/STAB A/I IND). STAB: (Location Tip: DC BUS 2/ICE AND RAIN PROTECTION/STAB). (2) Put the ladder in front of the LH or RH leading edges of the horizontal stabilizers. (3) Remove the leading edge 331 or 332 of the horizontal stabilizer ( AMM TASK 55-15-00-000-801-A/400). (4) Remove the damping chamber of the Horizontal-Stabilizer Thermal Anti-Icing System (AMM TASK 30-12-09-000-801-A/400). J. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Remove the lockwire (1) and loosen the clamp (2). (2) Remove the hose (3) from the tube (4). (3) Remove the bolts (5), washers (6), and clamps (7) that hold the tubes (4) and (8). (4) Remove the bolt (9), strap (10), washer (11), nut (12), and clamp (13) from the tube (8). (5) Disconnect the tube nuts (14) from the "T" connection (15 ) and from the differential pressure switch (16). (6) Remove the tubes (8) and (18). (7) Remove the rubber grommet (17) from the tube (8). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 30-12-10 Page 3 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL Horizontal-Stabilizer Anti-Icing Monitoring Tubes - Removal/Installation Figure 401 1. LOCKWIRE 3. HOSE 4. TUBE A ZONES 333 334 2 2. CLAMP DET. B 8. TUBE C 13. CLAMP D 9. BOLT 11. WASHER 12. NUT C 10. STRAP DET. E 3. HOSE 4. TUBE B 17. RUBBER C GROMMET 8. TUBE C E DET. A 15. "T"CONNECTION 14. TUBE C NUT 1 6. WASHER E 8. TUBE 18. TUBE 18. TUBE 7. CLAMP 17. RUBBER GROMMET 5. BOLT 14. TUBE 1 NUT DET. D 16. DIFFERENTIAL DET. C PRESSURE SWITCH 1 TORQUE: 5.6 N.m TO 7.3 N.m ( 50 lb.in TO 65 lb.in ) 2 POST-MOD SB 145-30-0014 145AMM300076.MCE B TORQUE: 1.1 N.m TO 1.7 N.m ( 10 lb.in TO 15 lb.in ) EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 30-12-10 Page 4 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 30-12-10-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. HORIZONTAL-STABILIZER ANTI-ICING MONITORING TUBES - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to install the horizontal-stabilizer anti-icing monitoring tubes. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 30-12-09-400-801-A/400 DAMPING CHAMBER - INSTALLATION HORIZONTAL-STABILIZER ANTI-ICING SYSTEM AMM TASK 30-12-10-700-801-A/500 MONITORING TUBES - LEAKAGE/TEST HORIZONTAL-STABILIZER LEADING EDGE - IN- AMM TASK 55-15-00-400-801-A/400 STALLATION S.B.145-30-0022 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 331 LH side of the horizontal-stabilizer 332 RH side of the horizontal-stabilizer D. Tools and Equipment ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Torque wrench To tighten the attachment nuts available E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially To get access to the leading edges of the Ladder 1 available horizontal stabilizer F. Consumable Materials SPECIFICATION DESCRIPTION QTY (BRAND) MS 20995C20 Lockwire AR G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 30-12-10 Page 5 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE LH or RH leading edges of the horizontal 1 Does the task stabilizer I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Connect the tubes (18) and torque the tube nut (14), the "T" connections (15), and the differential pressure switch (16). (2) Install the rubber grommet (17) on the tube (8). (3) Connect the tubes (8) to the "T" connections (15). (4) Install the clamp (13) and the strap (10) on the tube ( 8) with the bolts (9), washers (11), and nuts (12). (5) Install the tube (4) and all the clamps (7), with the bolts (5) and washers (6). (6) Install the clamp (2) on the hose (3) and install it on the tube (4), torque the clamp (2). (7) Install the lockwire (1) to the clamp (2). J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Install the damping chamber of the Horizontal-Stabilizer Thermal Anti-Icing System (AMM TASK 30-12-09-400-801-A/400). (2) Do the horizontal-stabilizer anti-icing monitoring tube leakage test (AMM TASK 30-12-10-700-801-A/500). (3) On the overhead Circuit Breaker Panel, close the circuit breakers below and remove the DO-NOT-CLOSE tag from them. • (PRE-MOD. S.B.145-30-0022) STAB: (Location Tip: DC BUS 2/ICE AND RAIN PROTECTION/STAB). • (POST-MOD. S.B.145-30-0022) STAB A/I IND: (Location Tip: DC BUS 1/ICE AND RAIN PROTECTION/STAB A/I IND). STAB: (Location Tip: DC BUS 2/ICE AND RAIN PROTECTION/STAB). (4) Install the leading edge 331 or 332 of the horizontal stabilizer ( AMM TASK 55-15-00-400-801-A/400). (5) Remove the ladder from the LH or RH leading edges of the horizontal stabilizers. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 30-12-10 Page 6 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
